title: A New College Course Compares Taylor Swift to Shakespeare???
description:
A new English course at the University of Texas at Austin will examine Taylor Swift's lyrics alongside the works of classic lit by authors like Shakespeare, Keats, and Frost. And parents will pay for this.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
